About

Hi, and welcome to my blog! Here, I'll be recording down all the interesting thoughts and fun stories I come up with. If you haven't been to my main website yet, you can find it here!


As I learn more, I'll be updating this site to make it look much better. I may just copy a WordPress template or open an account there. Either way, I'm also trying to figure out how I want to showcase things like the music and games I'm writing as well. I might have to revise a few things.
